dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 62 Coronary Computed Tomography (CCTA) images of patients with coronary artery disease, from which 222 unique 3D segmentation map patches were extracted. Each segmentation map contains lumen, vessel wall, and diseased calcified tissue within the straightened coronary artery.
dcterms:title: Coronary Computed Tomography (CCTA) images
